description: This file sets up and runs an agent that interacts with a PostgreSQL-backed knowledge base containing PDF recipes, utilizing vector search and session management.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of interacting with knowledge base and user sessions.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class that loads PDF URLs and provides vector search capabilities.

classes.name: AgentMemory
classes.description: Manages the memory state for the agent.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions and data in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Represents a vector database for semantic search, using pgvector.

methods.name: pdf_agent
methods.description: Main function to initialize or continue an agent session, load knowledge base, and run CLI app.
